net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

Interface Realm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RealmImpl

    public interface Realm
    Authentication realm.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Get the authentication method.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticationMethod

        AuthenticationMethod getAuthenticationMethod()
        Get the authentication method.
        Returns:
        AuthenticationMethod.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of the realm.
        Returns:
        Returns the name.

      • getRoleByName

        Role getRoleByName(String roleName)
        Get role by name.
        Parameters:
        roleName - the role name.
        Returns:
        the role or null.

      • getRoles

        Collection<? extends Role> getRoles()
        Get the roles.
        Returns:
        Collection of Role objects.

      • getSecrets

        List<String> getSecrets(String authorizationName)
        Get the secret value for the authorization name.
        Parameters:
        authorizationName - The authorization name.
        Returns:
        The authorization secrets or an empty list if there are none.

      • isAuthorizationValid

        boolean isAuthorizationValid(AuthState state,
                           String authorizationName,
                           String authorizationSecret)
        Check if the authorization information is valid for this realm. If the authorization name is not defined in this realm then false is returned. If the realm has no user secrets then this method always returns false.
        Parameters:
        state - state of request for authorization.
        authorizationName - The authorization name.
        authorizationSecret - The authorization secret.
        Returns:
        true if the authorization name is defined in this realm and the secret matches.

      • isIPValid

        boolean isIPValid(String ipAddress)
        Check if the IP address matches one of the IP patterns. If there are no IP patterns defined this method always returns false.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - The IP address.
        Returns:
        true if the IP address matches one of the patterns.

      • isValidForURL

        boolean isValidForURL(URL url)
        Return true if valid for URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL.
        Returns:
        true or false.
